text: Teisnach (Northern Bavarian: Deisna) is a larger municipality in Regen in Bavaria in Germany. ==Geography== Teisnach is in the Bavarian Forest region in Lower Bavaria. The municipality is on the mouth of the river Teisnach into the Schwarzer Regen (river) about 25 kilometers north of Deggendorf and about 170 kilometers northeast of the Bavarian capital Munich. ==References== Category:Regen (district)
title: Teisnach
